issue.title: Introduce NumericTensor class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2759>

This commit defines the new NumericTensor class as a subclass of Tensor class. NumericTensor extends Tensor class by adding a member function to access element values in a tensor.

I want to use this new feature for writing tests of SparseTensor in [#2546](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2546).
